articles.description: The railway ticket officer was spat at by a man who said he had coronavirus. The 47-year-old contracted the virus and died leaving behind an 11-year-old daughter and husband.
articles.content:
A railway ticket office worker has died of coronavirus after being spat at while on duty.
Belly Mujinga, 47, was on the concourse of Victoria Station in London in March when a member of the public who said he had COVID-19 spat and coughed at her and a collea… [+2578 chars]

articles.title: Dog puberty 'naughty phase' mirrors humans - The Transcontinental
articles.description: Teenage rebellion is an indisputable phenomenon among humans and scientists have now found it happens in dogs, who become less obedient when they hit puberty.
articles.content:
